channel.title: Inferno need new players and staff
channel.description:
Hello every one Welcome to Inferno, the creatures of Deception.
Inferno is a customs server. Popular features include: iron man mode, hardcore iron man mode, working skills, completionist cape w/ requirements, mini bosses, boss pets and games of chance like dicing. Player input is highly valued and always considered for integration. We have a loyalty shop where you can spend your loyalty points and excellent donation benefits. Updated daily. Come give us a try!
[url=http://www.deception-ps.com]Inferno[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cE0WjGm.gif[/img]
Extreme zone [IMG]http://puu.sh/ptEYE/f5baa69143.jpg[/img]
Present zone, more advance then Mbox [IMG]http://puu.sh/ptEvL/3b472421dc.jpg[/img]
BoSSES [IMG]http://puu.sh/ptEuf/16cbcf6c74.jpg[/img]
OS bosses [IMG]http://puu.sh/ptEtn/a0505a17f1.jpg[/img]
Some customs [IMG]http://puu.sh/ptEqM/5e5a3bf6ce.png[/img]
Home getting rework though [IMG]http://puu.sh/ptEq0/4ebdb749a2.jpg[/img]
mini bosses [IMG]http://puu.sh/ptCBt/4887c2a525.jpg[/img]
some of the commands [IMG]http://puu.sh/oxBg0/4f2ec052f4.png[/img]
os weapons [IMG]http://puu.sh/oxBaT/724b7be228.jpg[/img]
boss pets [IMG]http://puu.sh/nNE6m/5726ca3c3b.jpg[/img]
old vid [video=youtube;0sKyj3Gk9jk]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0sKyj3Gk9jk[/video]
